
```{r}
daten <- read_csv(here::here("daten/KTZH_00002423_00004863 (1).csv"))

glimpse(daten)

names(daten)

```

```{r}
cols_to_keep <- sapply(daten, function(x) !any(x == "Nein"))
daten <- daten[, cols_to_keep]
daten<-select(daten, -ID)
daten_t <- as.data.frame(t(daten))
daten_t <- rownames_to_column(daten_t, var = "Variable")
column_names_row <- c("Variable", colnames(daten))
colnames(daten_t) <- daten_t[1,]
daten_t <- daten_t[-1, ]
rownames(daten_t) <- NULL
daten_t <- daten_t |> 
  rename(Werte = Indikator)


```
